title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Indulge in the flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas! This bundle includes 36 count tea bags each of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. 

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend of apples, cinnamon, cloves, and ginger. It evokes the cozy feeling of apple cider and is the perfect companion to the vibrant colors of the harvest season. 

The Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a delightful caffeine-free blend of sweet apples and vanilla. Crafted with South African Rooibos, each cup warms the senses with the essence of autumn. Enjoy it as a dessert tea, enhanced with a splash of warm milk.

Steeping these herbal teas is a breeze. Simply bring fresh, filtered water to a rolling boil, pour 6 oz of water over the tea bags, and steep for 5-7 minutes. And after you've enjoyed your cup, feel free to add the used tea bags to your compost or soil for a happy garden.

Experience the essence of fall with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas. Order yours today and savor the flavors of the season!

Indulge in the flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas! This bundle includes Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, both containing 36 count tea bags. The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend of apples, cinnamon, cloves, and ginger, reminiscent of apple cider. The luscious aromas of cinnamon and cloves make it the perfect accompaniment to the colors of the harvest season. On the other hand, the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend of sweet apples and vanilla, with a base of South African Rooibos. Each cup warms the senses with the flavors of autumn, making it a delightful dessert tea when enjoyed with a splash of warm milk. Steeping these herbal teas is easy, simply heat fresh, filtered water to a rolling boil, pour 6 oz water over tea, and steep for 5-7 minutes. Afterward, you can add the used tea bags to compost or soil, making gardens happy. Don't miss out on this limited-edition bundle that captures the essence of the season!

The luscious aromas of cinnamon and cloves make it the perfect accompaniment to the colors of autumn. Our Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, on the other hand, blends sweet apples and vanilla with a base of South African Rooibos, creating a warm and comforting cup of tea. This caffeine-free blend is a delightful dessert tea, especially when enjoyed with a splash of warm milk. Steeping these herbal teas is easy - simply heat fresh, filtered water to a rolling boil, pour it over the tea, and steep for 5-7 minutes. Afterward, you can even add the used tea bags to compost or soil, as they make gardens happy. Don't miss out on this exquisite bundle of fall flavors - get your Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle today!

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each

Description: HOT APPLE CIDER HERBAL TEA: A naturally-caffeine free blend of apples, cinnamon, cloves and ginger. Reminiscent of apple cider, the luscious aromas of cinnamon and cloves make this cup the perfect accompaniment to the colors of the harvest season.

HOT APPLE CIDER INGREDIENTS: Apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid and cardamom seeds

CARAMEL APPLE HERBAL TEA: Step into the season of crisp air, cuddly sweaters and rosy cheeks while sipping this caffeine-free blend of sweet apples and vanilla. With a base of South African Rooibos, each cup warms the senses with t he flavors of autumn. It’s wonderful as a dessert tea enjoyed with a splash of warm milk.

CARAMEL APPLE INGREDIENTS: Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors and vanilla extract

STEEPING HERBAL TEA IS EASY: Simply heat fresh, filtered water t o a rolling boil. Then pour 6 oz water over tea and steep for 5-7 minutes. After steeping, add the used tea bags to compost or soil — they make gardens happy.

Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle HOT APPLE CIDER HERBAL TEA: A naturally-caffeine free blend of apples, cinnamon, cloves and ginger. Reminiscent of apple cider, the luscious aromas of cinnamon and cloves make this cup the perfect accompaniment to the colors of the harvest season. CARAMEL APPLE HERBAL TEA: Step into the season of crisp air, cuddly sweaters and rosy cheeks while sipping this caffeine-free blend of sweet apples and vanilla. With a base of South African Rooibos, each cup warms the senses with t he flavors of autumn. It’s wonderful as a dessert tea enjoyed with a splash of warm milk.
